page.title: 20AT THE MARKET GARDENS
page.content: {The market gardens of Leasowe and {Moreton form a strip on the land {between the main Leasowe road,and the {coastal dunes. { At the market gardens they grow lots of vegetables,fruit and flowers.They also sell straw for animals and food for them.We went to explore the market gardens and found many different things growing,like Radish,Peas,Beetroot,Potatoes,Carrots, Cauliflowers,Onion,Spinach,Marrows. After we had been to the market garden we went to the beach. In the afternoon we wrote about what we had found that morning for the Domesday Project,and it was very interesting.
